title: Linux bzmore Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the bzmore command in Linux, a tool for viewing compressed text files. Learn its functionality and practical examples to enhance your compression and archiving skills.

verify.name: Verify the bzmore command

verify.name: Verify the bzmore command options
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the different options of the `bzmore` command to view the contents of the compressed file.

verify.name: Verify the bzmore command usage
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `bzmore` command to view the contents of compressed files, search for specific content, and view compressed man pages.
